title: 'wright auction': ultrabold faux-stencil didone caps - probably custom
content:
Does anyone know what this typeface is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015020212im_/http:/typophile.com/files/portfolio_3st_hires-17-1_3428.jpg)
author: Renata Graw

comments.content:
Wow - I'd like to know too!

hhp

Hi Renata,

I’d say someone played around with an [extra-bold didone](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015020212/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/didone_extra_bold/?&sample_text=WRIGHT&sample_size=74), like [Poster Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015020212/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bodoni-poster/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DWRIGHT%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D27).  
F

That superb "G" indicates more than "play"!  
Although I agree it might not be a font... yet.

hhp

That is what I suspected.  
Thanks!
